issue.title: [CF 825] Range condition
issue.body:
There currently only exists the condition to check the range to another unit via a spell. Sadly my warrior doesn't have any spell that has a range of 40 yards, except for vigilance, which I rarely use. Now my raidframes can reliably change the opacity of players coming in and going out of 40 yards range. Wouldn't this also be possible for TellMeWhen?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #825 | Raw

comments.body:
You need to use an item range condition. Vial of the Sunwell (34471) has a 40 yard range for friendly units. The Decapitator (28767) has a 40 yard range for enemy units.

You don't need these items to check them in an item range condition. Just check them by itemID.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks alot.

Do other addons use this method too or is this just a workaround specific to TellMeWhen?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Other addons do it too. It is the way that librangecheck-2.0 works. There aren't any conditions that use LRC-2 because it can only be approximate (it gives a min-max range that a unit is within) and I'm not sure how to elegantly implement that into a condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
